What are the genetic changes related to spinal muscular atrophy with progressive myoclonic epilepsy ?,"SMA-PME is caused by mutations in the ASAH1 gene. This gene provides instructions for making an enzyme called acid ceramidase. This enzyme is found in lysosomes, which are cell compartments that digest and recycle materials.
